Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.modules

Class ClientAuthenticator

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.modules.ClientAuthenticator
All Implemented Interfaces:
JsonCommandChangeListener
public class ClientAuthenticator extends Object implements JsonCommandChangeListener
Handles the client request of entering its nickname If a nickname is already present it will be re-requested to the client

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientAuthenticator

      public ClientAuthenticator(ClientHandler clientHandler, ConcurrentSkipListSet<String> nicknames, ConcurrentMap<ClientHandler,String> clientNicknames, ClientHandlerChangeListener chcl)
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - the client handler that handles the current client
      nicknames - the list of nicknames that is used to see if client requested nickname is already present
      clientNicknames - the association of client and nickname, the client is added to this list when it sends a valid nickname
      chcl - the client handler listener that will be notified when the client has inserted a valid nickname (i.e. server)

  • Method Details

    • jsonCommandChange

      public void jsonCommandChange(JsonCommandChangeEvent event)
      Fired when the message with the nickname is received from the client
      Specified by:
      jsonCommandChange in interface JsonCommandChangeListener

    • isNicknameAlreadyPresent

      private boolean isNicknameAlreadyPresent(String nickname)
      Returns:
      true if the given nickname is already present, false otherwise

    • addNickname

      private void addNickname(String name)
      Adds the nickname to the list owned by the server then notifies it
